qas.question: In what year did the Hungarian revolution take place?
Who felt Austria would side with him due to the Hungarian revolution outcome?
Who did Austria feel threatened by?
Who wanted the Russian forces to leave the principalities?
Why did the U.K and France get involved with the war against the Russia?

context: <a1_0>Nicholas<a1_0/> felt that, because of Russian assistance in suppressing the Hungarian revolution of <a0_0>1848<a0_0/>, Austria would side with him, or at the very least remain neutral. Austria, however, felt threatened by the <a2_0>Russian troops in the Balkans<a2_0/>. On 27 February 1854, <a3_0>the United Kingdom and France<a3_0/> demanded the withdrawal of Russian forces from the principalities; Austria supported them and, though it did not declare war on Russia, it refused to guarantee its neutrality. <a4_0>Russia's rejection of the ultimatum<a4_0/> caused the UK and France to enter the war.
